name: Whizz Pack 1
overview: A two game pack comprising Runaway Rocket (aka Space Chase) and Space Shapes. In Runaway Rocket you guide the rocket around the screen avoiding it's deadly smoke trail until the Mothership comes and rescues it. If you bump into the smoke trail the rocket will be destroyed, and in harder levels you also have to avoid deadly asteroids which will also destroy your rocket on impact. Space Shapes is a game where you must remember the order of the flashing shapes as they appear on the screen.
